name: Lost in the Dark (eternalStudent)
description:
A short simple game done as part of 7DRL Challenge 2023. 

You are spawned in a huge (procedurally generated) cavern. You have no idea where the exit is, and you have only a single source of light that is slowly dying out. You can only see what's around you, and you don't have a map of where you had been. The winning scenario is finding the exit before the light completely dies. 

You move with arrow key + PgUp, PgDn, Home, End for diagonal movements.

Sound Design by Josh Burne (StereoPixel) : https://josh-stereopixel.itch.io/
Testing done by LomQ  https://itch.io/profile/lomq
